casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Masoud RASHIDI. No. 510A05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Alexandra M. Hightower, Assistant Attorney General, Peter S. Gilchrist, III, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th day of December 2006 by Defendant to relieve the defendant from the Court's adverse judgment:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
